targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) FROM analytics.user_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE UNION ALL SELECT count(*) FROM analytics.transaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE UNION ALL SELECT count(*) FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE
SELECT count(*) FROM analytics.user_events_mv WHERE event_type = 'user_registered' AND timestamp >= today()
SELECT sum(amount) FROM analytics.transaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= today()

SELECT uniq(user_id) FROM (SELECT user_id FROM analytics.user_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR UNION ALL SELECT user_id FROM analytics.transaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR UNION ALL SELECT user_id FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR)

SELECT toStartOfMinute(timestamp) as time, event_type, count(*) as count FROM (SELECT timestamp, event_type FROM analytics.user_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, event_type FROM analytics.transaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR UNION ALL SELECT timestamp, event_type FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR) GROUP BY time, event_type ORDER BY time
SELECT page, count(*) as visits FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE event_type = 'page_view' AND timestamp >= today() AND page IS NOT NULL GROUP BY page ORDER BY visits DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT query, count(*) as searches FROM analytics.interaction_events_mv WHERE event_type = 'search' AND timestamp >= today() AND query IS NOT NULL GROUP BY query ORDER BY searches DESC LIMIT 10
